qa.question: Main Phone Use
qa.answer: Calls, WhatsApp voice messages, devotional songs.

qa.question: Phone Sharing
qa.answer: Shared with husband for calls.

qa.question: Favorite Apps
qa.answer: Only WhatsApp, don’t know about data.

qa.question: Permission Reading
qa.answer: Cannot read, employer’s daughter presses buttons.

qa.question: App Trust
qa.answer: Use what’s already installed or by employer’s family.

qa.question: Content Deletion
qa.answer: Don’t know how, ask son if phone slow.

qa.question: Phone Repair
qa.answer: Give directly to shop, don’t delete anything.

qa.question: Help with Problems
qa.answer: Ask son or employer’s daughter, feel shy.

qa.question: Trusted People
qa.answer: Only trust son.

qa.question: Code Words
qa.answer: No, just voice messages.

qa.question: Helped Someone
qa.answer: Never helped, always ask others.

qa.question: Permission Control
qa.answer: Didn’t know possible.

qa.question: Warning Messages
qa.answer: Don’t understand, give to son.

qa.question: Access to Contacts/Photos
qa.answer: Think it helps send pictures/calls.

qa.question: Repair Hesitation
qa.answer: Nervous, don’t know how to delete.

qa.question: Repair Person Behavior
qa.answer: Yes, shopkeeper opened WhatsApp and laughed.

qa.question: Password Use
qa.answer: No, forget code, son removed it.

qa.question: Local vs International Apps
qa.answer: Don’t know origin, don’t download myself.

qa.question: Tech Help
qa.answer: Ask son or employer’s daughter.

qa.question: Social Influence
qa.answer: Son warns not to share Aadhaar/bank info.

scenarios.Broken Phone: Give to shop, repairman opened gallery, felt bad.
scenarios.Sharing with Family: Husband uses phone, delete son’s messages after listening.
scenarios.Helping Elderly Relative: Not able, tell them to ask children.
scenarios.Using Borrowed Phone: Return quickly if private content seen.
scenarios.Giving Away Phone: Son deletes everything before giving away.
scenarios.Cloud Backup Surprise: Deleted photo came back, son explained cloud.
scenarios.Free Public WiFi: Don’t know how to connect, use mobile data.
scenarios.Lottery Call: Believed call, told son, he blocked number.
